title: / 2bd/2bth- Large & Beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath
posting_body: Uber Rarely Available premium 2x2 in the heart of San Francisco, yet a world away!
Contact Natascha for Viewing and Information.
This building is located in a fabulous location on Ocean Beach in the Sunset District of San Francisco.
On La Playa (between J and K streets.)
Do you wish you could live in a place within blocks of Golden Gate Park?
Do you love watching the night fall on the sun-kissed beach on twilight walks?
Love to Surf??!
Then this is the apartment for you!
If your application is accepted, you will be living directly across the street from one of the most expansive beaches in the world!
A beautiful unit with upgraded finishes, flooring, fixtures and appliances and located on the third floor.
Very generous closets and floorplan.
MUNI stop just a block away for those who still commute.
Super cute, secured building with elevator, 24 private onsite laundromat and assigned parking in a garage.
Bright and sunny bathroom naturally lit by a skylights in both bathrooms.
All that is missing?
New Tenant(s)!
Please email for an appointment to view the unit in this exclusive community!
Serious Inquiries Only please.
All are welcome to see and apply for the unit, but decisions to rent are based on a good credit rating and verifiable property management or Resident Manager references.
First Month's Rent plus Security Deposit.
Includes water.
$2,850.00 per month.
Showings available all day Tuesdays, Wednesdays, & Thursdays!
And most evenings during the week.
Call or email now!
Please note:  "no shows" will not be taken lightly.
Housing is serious business, and no out-of-state tenant applications - we want to meet you in person please.
